verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4468>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5975>'Stand<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> [in] the Lord's <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them. Do not <S%H1639>omit<s%> a <S%H1697>word!<s%>

<S%H194>'Perhaps<s%> they will <S%H8085>listen<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> that I may <S%H5162>repent<s%> of the <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H2803>planning<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to them <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>'

"And you will <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me, to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you,

to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have been <S%H7971>sending<s%> to you <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H7971>again,<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>listened;<s%>

then I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> "'"

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And when <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [him] to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8610>seized<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You <S%H4191>must<s%> <S%H4191>die!<s%>

<S%H4069>"Why<s%> have you <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> will be like <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> will be <S%H2717>desolate,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>'?" And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H413>about<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And when the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> they <S%H5927>came<s%> up from the king's <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H2319>New<s%> <S%H8179>Gate<s%> of the Lord's [house.]

Then the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H8269>officials<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "A <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H4941>sentence<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man!<s%> For he has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> as you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> in your <S%H241>hearing.<s%>"

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>officials<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that you have <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore <S%H3190>amend<s%> your ways and your <S%H4611>deeds,<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5162>change<s%> His <S%H5162>mind<s%> <S%H413>about<s%> the <S%H9567>misfortune<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.
"But as for me, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am in your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> with me as is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

<S%H389>"Only<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H4191>put<s%> me to <S%H4191>death,<s%> you will <S%H5414>bring<s%> <S%H9345>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on yourselves, and on <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants;<s%> for <S%H571>truly<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H241>hearing.<s%>"

Then the <S%H8269>officials<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H369>"No<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H4941>sentence<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man!<s%> For he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>"

Then <S%H376>some<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H4318>"Micah<s%> of <S%H4183>Moresheth<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6726>"Zion<s%> will be <S%H9177>plowed<s%> [as] a <S%H7704>field,<s%> And <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5856>ruins,<s%> And the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> as the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of a <S%H9194>forest.<s%>"'

"Did <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%>? Did he not <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H9134>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5162>changed<s%> His <S%H5162>mind<s%> <S%H413>about<s%> the <S%H9567>misfortune<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them? But we are <S%H6213>committing<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H5315>ourselves.<s%>"

<S%H1571>Indeed,<s%> there was <S%H1571>also<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9005>Uriah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> from Kiriath-jearim; and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> similar to <S%H3605>all<s%> those of <S%H3414>Jeremiah.<s%>

When <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>officials<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words,<s%> then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death;<s%> but <S%H9005>Uriah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it,] and he was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H494>Elnathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> and [certain] <S%H376>men<s%> with him [went] into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H9005>Uriah<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H935>led<s%> him to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> who <S%H5221>slew<s%> him with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> his <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>body<s%> into the <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H6913>place<s%> of the <S%H1121>common<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> was with <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> so that he was not <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
